name: Pechenki
description:
Pechenki
(C) 2015 Harry Trautmann

Four little guys want to eat cookies. Help them!
You can shoot them out of mugs by pressing SPACE, the A, S, W, D keys or by clicking on the colored buttons. But you cannot control them directly.
Turn the level walls by pressing the LEFT and RIGHT ARROW keys.

At least one little guy must reach a white mug, so that you can advance to the next level. Avoid black mugs though - they swallow the little guys.

All cookies give points. Eat as much as you can!
If a cookie has a color on it then the little guy will only eat those of its own color.
The jam filled heart cookies are 1UPs!

Find more great game experiments at http://metacozm.com

All code and art was made by Harry Trautmann, except the following:

Font "Sztylet" by "Cannot Into Space Fonts"
https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/sztylet
via Open Font License (OFL)
